import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./Home.css" function Home(props){ const [animate1, setAnimate1] = useState(false) const [animate2, setAnimate2] = useState(false) const [animate3, setAnimate3] = useState(false) const [fixed, setFixed] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setAnimate3(true) }, 300); setTimeout(() => { setAnimate2(true) }, 600); setTimeout(() => { setAnimate1(true) }, 1200); }, []) const fixedPosition = ( ) return(
) } export default Home
